titles.title: A bill to amend the Neotropical Migratory Bird Conservation Act to reauthorize the Act.
A bill to amend the Neotropical Migratory Bird Conservation Act to reauthorize the Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Boxer with amendments. With written report No. 113-188.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 419.

bill.summary: Amends the Neotropical Migratory Bird Conservation Act to authorize $6.5 million for each of FY2014-FY2019 to carry out such Act.
